sourcesContent: import React from "react" import { Typography } from "@mui/material" import IntroduceWorkArticle from "../molecules/IntroduceWorkArticle" import netsuper from "assets/images/kurashiru_net-super_integration.png" import { Box } from "@mui/system" import creative from "../../../assets/images/kurashiru_store_creative.png" import flow from "../../../assets/images/kurashiru_store_flow.png" import spec from "../../../assets/images/kurashiru_store_spec.png" import styled from "@emotion/styled" import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next" function NetsuperIntegration(): React.ReactElement { const { t } = useTranslation() const articleImage = (imageSrc: string, alt: string) => { return } const StyledParagraph = styled(Typography)` margin: 16px 0; ` return ( {t("short_descripton_kurashiru_store_02")} {t("Role")} {t("UI/UX Designer")} {t("Front-end engineer")} {t("Tools")} Figma, Visual Studio Code, SourceTree {t("Skills")} {t("UI/UX Design")}, {t("Graphic Design")}, {t("Front-end engineering")}{" "} (ERB, vue.js, HTML/CSS), Git (GitHub) {t("Challenges")} {t("kurashiru_store_article_paragraph_01")} {t("kurashiru_store_article_paragraph_02")} {articleImage( creative, "Example of my creative works (static landing page)" )} {t("Design")} {articleImage( spec, "part of the design specification of kurashiru store" )} {t("kurashiru_store_article_paragraph_03")} {articleImage(flow, "Sign up flow.")} {t("kurashiru_store_article_paragraph_04")} ) } export default NetsuperIntegration
